about_the_game:
Liquor and Wine Shop Simulator takes you on a relaxing journey through the charming streets of France, where you'll run your very own wine and liquor shop! In this chill store management game, you'll start as a humble cashier, scanning items, giving the correct change, and earning your way to the top. But that's just the beginning—design and decorate your store with French-inspired elegance, from rustic wooden wine racks to stylish décor that will attract connoisseurs from far and wide.

This is a fun and relaxing store management game where you run your very own liquor and wine shop! Start small as a cashier, scanning items and giving the correct change to your customers, then work your way up to managing a full-fledged business. You'll need to keep your shelves stocked with the finest wines, spirits, and craft liquors, while finding the best deals from suppliers to maximize your profits.

Liquor and Wine Shop Simulator - Game Features:

  • Start as a Cashier – Begin your journey as a cashier in a quaint French wine shop, where you'll scan items, give the correct change to customers, and build your business from the ground up.

  • Manage Your Store – Take full control of the shop's operations, from ordering supplies and stocking shelves to setting competitive prices and offering special promotions.

  • Stock Wine & Liquor – Curate a wide selection of fine wines and spirits. Discover the best local French vineyards and distilleries, and choose what to stock based on customer demand and quality.

  • Wholesale Purchases – Buy your stock in bulk at wholesale prices, finding the best deals to maximize profit while keeping a well-balanced inventory.

  • License System – Start with basic wines and liquors, but as you grow, you’ll need to purchase licenses to sell heavier and more exclusive spirits, expanding your product range.

  • Set Your Own Prices – Determine your store's pricing strategy. Choose to offer premium products for higher profits or attract more customers with competitive prices.

  • Custom Shop Design – Fully customize your shop's interior with a variety of French-inspired décor, shelving, and layouts to make your store stand out and appeal to your clientele.

  • Business Growth – Expand your shop as profits roll in, opening new locations and transforming your small business into a multi-millionaire franchise empire across different regions of France.

  • Supply & Demand – Keep track of customer trends and preferences, adjusting your stock to meet demand and boost sales.

  • Financial Management – Monitor your profits, losses, and expenses. Manage your budget wisely to afford upgrades, licenses, and expansions.

  • Challenging Customers – Deal with a range of customer personalities, making sure no one gets drunk in your store and maintaining order while offering great service.

  • Upgrade Your Shop – Invest in better shelves, faster checkout systems, and more efficient stock management tools to streamline operations and improve customer satisfaction.

Design and customize your shop’s interior to attract more customers, from sleek shelves to vibrant decor. As you grow your business, expand into multiple franchises and dominate the market! But beware—don't let your customers get too tipsy in your store! Keep things orderly while enjoying the laid-back vibe of building your dream store empire.

With a balance of strategy, creativity, and a little chaos control, Liquor and Wine Shop Simulator offers a chill yet rewarding experience as you sip your way to success!
